title: Secrets about Quantum and non-verbal hypnosis with strong hypnotic trance states / Dr. Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret reveals secrets about Quantum and Non-verbal hypnosis. He and his students demonstrate strong hypnotic trance states of mesmeric crisis, hypnotic induction, fascination and more exercices from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclasses. All of the subjects felt deeply liberated after the hypnotic experiences. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
